DOC.brief_summary: This study aims at a direct comparison between Multihance and a validated comparator like Omniscan in a cross-over individual design in patients with brain tumors to confirm the superior overall diagnostic performance of MuliHance for this indication
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Two Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) Contrast Agents in MRI of the Brain
DOC.criteria: 18 yrs of age or older; provide written informed consent; scheduled to undergo MRI; willing to undergo 2 MRI exams within 14 days Known allergy to one or more ingredients in the test agents; severe CHF (Class IV); suffered stroke one year ago; pregnancy or lactating females; contraindications to MRI; severe claustrophobia; scheduled to receive surgery prior to or between the two MRI exams, or steroids or radiosurgery between the two MRI exams
